item.title: Daughter's breathing
item.description: Video footage posted by Kwajo Tweneboa. The clip shows the breathing of the two year old daughter of a Catalyst tenant, suffering from extensive housedhold damp and mould.

item.title: Jennifer Brathwaite tweet
item.description: 2015 tweet posted by Jennifer Brathwaite, former Deputy Leader and former Cabinet Member for Housing in Lambeth Council. Directly links regeneration as a solution to the damp conditions endured by residents on the Central Hill estate.
